Gil Colson; Jayme Lawson (â€œFarewell Amorâ€) as mayoral candidate Bella ReÃ¡l; with Andy Serkis (the â€œPlanet of the Apesâ€ films, â€œBlack Pantherâ€) as Alfred; and Colin Farrell (â€œThe Gentlemen,â€ â€œFantastic Beasts and Where to Find Themâ€) as Oswald Cobblepot.
 
Reeves (â€œThe Planet of the Apesâ€ franchise) directed from a screenplay by Reeves & Peter Craig, based on characters from DC. Batman was created by Bob Kane with Bill Finger. Dylan Clark (the â€œPlanet of the Apesâ€ films) and Reeves produced the film, with Michael E. Uslan, Walter Hamada, Chantal Nong Vo and Simon Emanuel serving as executive producers. The directorâ€™s behind-the-scenes creative team included Oscar-nominated director of photography Greig Fraser (â€œDune,â€ â€œLionâ€); Reevesâ€™ â€œPlanet of the Apesâ€ production designer, James Chinlund, and editor, William Hoy; editor Tyler Nelson (â€œRememoryâ€); and Oscar-winning costume designer Jacqueline Durran (â€œ1917,â€ â€œLittle Women,â€ â€œAnna Kareninaâ€). The music is by Oscar-winning composer Michael Giacchino (the current â€œSpider-Man,â€ â€œJurassic Worldâ€ and â€œStar Warsâ€ films, â€œUpâ€).
 
Warner Bros. Pictures Presents a 6th & Idaho/Dylan Clark Productions Production, a Matt Reeves Film, â€œThe Batman.â€ The film is set to open in theaters March 4, 2022 and will be distributed worldwide by Warner Bros. Pictures.
